definitions.definition: In the initial position in a sequence whose elements are numbered starting at zero; the ordinal number corresponding to zero.
examples: The zeroth order polynomial approximation is constant.

definitions.definition: Corresponding to a position preceding the first.
examples: A and C are in equilibrium following the Zeroth Law of Thermodynamics.

main_definition: ( mathematics ) In the initial position in a sequence whose elements are numbered starting at zero; the ordinal number corresponding to zero.
secondary_definitions: Corresponding to a position preceding the first.
